nodes.text: The Battle of Chabosh was a conflict between the Sith Empire and a group of Jedi and rebels around 5300 BBY in which the Sith Lord Tulak Hord led an army of dark side warriors to capture the Jedi– and rebel–held Chabosh after he broke the Jedi siege of the planet Yn. Hord, his apprentice Ortan Cela, and their Dashade Shadow Killers Khem Val and Veshikk Urk led the Sith offensive, and during the fighting, Urk and Val feasted on the Force potential of their enemies, and Tulak Hord used a ritual to draw the strength of his enemies into himself.

The Battle of Chabosh was first mentioned in the entry for Khem Val on the Holonet portion of the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic's official site in 2011. It was later expanded on in the game itself, in conversations with Khem Val and several Codex entries.
